outputs.description: In 2011, in the prioritized geographical areas, there are specialized services of special protection and operational networksarticulated with the Decentralized Comprehensive Child and Adolescent Protection System, which is also monitoring enforcement oftheir rights by the Canton Councils for Children and Adolescents and the National Generation Equality Council.

ADVOCACY AND COMMUNICATIONS: Los problemas, soluciones y derechos de la  niñez y adolescencia, visibilizados ante sus familias,tomadores de decisión y opinión pública a fin de lograr prioridad en la vida de la familia y la sociedad.
In 2014, Ecuador strengthens its capacities for preparation, response and resilience in the education sector, for execution ofthe Ministry of Education's Public Policy on Risk Management.
The child development and early education strategy applies management standards and is working to improve cultural pertinence by2014.

By 2014, the country has indicators and instruction manuals for applying and monitoring the learning, professional performance(leadership and teachers) and school management standards, with differentiated strategies for groups in situations of highvulnerability.
PROGRAMME AND MANAGEMENT EXCELLENCE
By the end of 2014, the Ministry of Education has strengthened its capacity to improve the situation of over-age-for-gradeadolescents in the education system.
PRIOR-YEAR COMMITMENTS
CROSS CUT PROJECT SUPPORT
By 2014, the Primary Health Care (APS) model is applied, and the right to maternal breastfeeding is being promoted at the nationallevel at the legislative, private and family level.
Intercultural Public Policies
description text
Public institutions have capacities for the elimination of the under-registration of under-fives by 2014.
By 2014, public institutions have the capacity to promote strategies for building children's resilience in the face of violence.

By 2014, incarceration and non-incarceration measures for adolescents in conflict with the law and their adherence to national andinternational standards are institutionalized - at least in the cities of Quito and Guayaquil.

By 2014, incarceration and non-incarceration measures for adolescents in conflict with the law and their adherence to national andinternational standards are institutionalized - at least in the cities of Quito and Guayaquil.
By 2013, adolescents promote healthy lifestyles and call for conditions for the good way of living and a public opinion trend hasbeen built up promoting these lifestyles and conditions.
EIBAMAZ Regional Component
Monitoring and Management of the PCR
Public policies on decentralization and deconcentration of protection for the life cycle in the territories are being promoted andapplied by 2014.

By 2012, in their review of social investment, the Ministry of Finance, the Social Coordination Ministry, and UNICEF includeinformation broken down by territory, especially on education, health, and protection, and give this information back to citizenparticipation bodies at the national level and in priority areas.
Monitoring and Management of the PCR
By 2013, the public system to promote citizen participation incorporates the monitoring of public social policies on the exerciseof the rights of children and adolescents.
Advocacy / Communication
In country private sector fundraising cost-efficiently genertes quality funding to the Country Programme
